feed.title: Fire22 Dashboard - Error Code Registry
feed.subtitle: Real-time updates for Fire22 Dashboard error codes, system alerts, and troubleshooting information

entry.title: 🔴 CRITICAL: E1001 - SYSTEM_INIT_FAILED
entry.summary: System initialization failed - Core system components failed to initialize properly during application startup.
entry.content:
System Initialization Failed

Department: Technology Department 💻

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 500

Description: Core system components failed to initialize properly during application startup.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Insufficient system resources (memory, disk space)
  • Missing or corrupted configuration files
  • Failed dependency injection
  • Database connection failure during startup
  • Missing environment variables

💡 Quick Fix Commands:


# Check system resources
free -m && df -h

# Validate environment
bun run env:validate

# Check system logs  
journalctl -u fire22-dashboard

# Test database connectivity
bun run health:database

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag

📚 Documentation: System Troubleshooting Guide

entry.title: 🔴 CRITICAL: E2001 - DB_CONNECTION_FAILED
entry.summary: Database connection failed - Unable to establish connection to database server, preventing all data operations.
entry.content:
Database Connection Failed

Department: Technology Department 💻

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 503

Description: Unable to establish connection to database server, preventing all data operations.

🔍 Immediate Actions:


# Check database health
bun run health:database

# Test connectivity
ping db-host.fire22.ag

# Verify connection string
bun run test:db-connection

# Check database logs
docker logs fire22-postgres

🚨 Impact: All database operations are blocked

📞 Emergency Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag | ops-manager@fire22.ag

entry.title: 🔴 CRITICAL: E7001 - FIRE22_API_CONNECTION_FAILED
entry.summary: Fire22 API connection failed - Unable to connect to Fire22 sportsbook API, preventing betting operations.
entry.content:
Fire22 API Connection Failed

Department: Operations Department ⚙️ | Technology Department 💻

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 503

Description: Unable to connect to Fire22 sportsbook API, preventing betting operations and data sync.

🔍 Emergency Diagnostics:


# Check Fire22 API status
curl https://api.fire22.ag/health

# Test DNS resolution
nslookup api.fire22.ag

# Verify API credentials
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $FIRE22_TOKEN" https://api.fire22.ag/auth/verify

# Check rate limits
curl -I https://api.fire22.ag/v1/limits

🚨 Business Impact: Sportsbook operations disrupted, customer betting blocked

📞 Emergency Escalation: ops-manager@fire22.ag (Primary) | tech-team@fire22.ag (Technical)

📈 Monitor: Fire22 Integration Dashboard

entry.title: ⚠️ WARNING: E3001 - API_UNAUTHORIZED
entry.summary: Unauthorized API request - Request lacks valid authentication credentials or token has expired.
entry.content:
Unauthorized API Request

Department: Technology Department 💻 | Customer Support 🎧

Severity: WARNING

HTTP Status: 401

Description: Request lacks valid authentication credentials or token has expired.

🔍 Quick Diagnostics:


# Verify token format
echo $API_TOKEN | base64 -d | jq '.'

# Test authentication
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $API_TOKEN" https://api.fire22.ag/auth/verify

# Check token expiration
jwt decode $API_TOKEN

# Refresh token if expired
curl -X POST https://api.fire22.ag/auth/refresh

👥 User Impact: API clients experiencing authentication failures

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag | support@fire22.ag

entry.title: 🟡 ERROR: E8001 - TELEGRAM_BOT_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
entry.summary: Telegram bot authentication failed - Bot token is invalid or expired, preventing customer communication.
entry.content:
Telegram Bot Authentication Failed

Department: Customer Support Department 🎧 | Technology Department 💻

Severity: ERROR

HTTP Status: 401

Description: Telegram bot token is invalid or expired, preventing bot functionality and customer communication.

🔍 Bot Diagnostics:


# Verify bot token
curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/getMe

# Check bot permissions
curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/getMyCommands

# Test webhook
curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/getWebhookInfo

# Monitor bot logs
bun run logs:telegram-bot

👥 Customer Impact: Bot notifications disabled, customer support affected

📞 Primary Contact: support@fire22.ag

🔧 Technical Support: tech-team@fire22.ag

🤖 Bot Management: Contact @BotFather for token issues

entry.title: 📊 Fire22 Dashboard - Error Code Registry Feed Information
entry.summary: Fire22 Dashboard Error Code Registry system information and departmental assignments.
entry.content:
🔧 Error Code Registry System

This Atom feed provides real-time updates for Fire22 Dashboard error codes with departmental assignments and comprehensive troubleshooting information.

📈 Registry Statistics:

Metric Value
Total Error Codes 9 documented
Departments Involved 3 departments
Severity Levels Critical (3), Error (4), Warning (2)
Last Updated January 28, 2025

🏢 Department Responsibilities:

  • 💻 Technology Department: E1xxx (System), E2xxx (Database), E3xxx (API), E4xxx (Network)
  • ⚙️ Operations Department: E7xxx (Fire22 Integration), Business processes
  • 🎧 Customer Support: E8xxx (Telegram Bot), User communications
